meanings.definition: Tending to flirt or engage in flirtatious behavior.
meanings.sent1: She is flirtier than her shy friend.
meanings.sent2: The new student in class is flirtier than the others.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy was even flirtier than the mischievous kitten.
meanings.sent4: Her flirtier attitude was like a colorful butterfly fluttering around.
meanings.sent5: His flirtier smile lit up the room with charm.

meanings.definition: More flirtatious than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The red dress made her look flirtier than the blue one.
meanings.sent2: He became flirtier after watching romantic movies.
meanings.sent3: The flirtier cat always got more attention at the pet show.
meanings.sent4: Her flirtier behavior was like a magnet drawing people in.
meanings.sent5: The flirtier tone in her voice was hard to resist.
